name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block YouTube Feed - Homepage, Sidebar Videos

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block the homepage feed, sidebar suggestions, and end screen feed on YouTube.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Remove YouTube feeds. Through the extension's options popup, you can configure whether to hide or show the homepage feed, sidebar recommendations feed, and end screen videos.

Compatible with desktop, mobile, and embedded YouTube videos.

For more features including removing recommendations, comments, and more: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/unhook-remove-youtube-rec/khncfooichmfjbepaaaebmommgaepoid

Block YouTube Feed is also available on:
- Firefox: https://addons.mozilla.org/firefox/addon/block-youtube-feed/
- Microsoft Edge: https://microsoftedge.microsoft.com/addons/detail/block-youtube-feed-home/mjdimkkheacnhnlbakejglgpgcjibejl
